long_title: PRCT001 Aquablation theraPy Outcomes in pRostate Cancer patienTs
prior_treatment_requirements: * Cancer stage less than or equal to T2c
Exclude - * Patients with previous surgical treatment of benign prostatic hyperplasia
Exclude - * MRI evidence of extracapsular extension of cancer
Exclude - * Any severe illness that would prevent complete study participation or confound study results
short_title: PRCT001 Aquablation theraPy Outcomes in pRostate Cancer patienTs
summary: The goal of this clinical trial is to assess the performance and safety of the AQUABEAM Robotic System for the resection and removal of prostate tissue in patients experiencing lower urinary tract symptoms (LUTS) and are diagnosed with localized prostate cancer. Participants will go through baseline and follow up assessments up to 12 months.
